channel.title: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server
channel.description:
Ok, I tried to read the Java guide Miss. Silabsoft pointed out.. but I can't stand when people *baby* you into something. I know HTML and Javascript and have wanted to learn Java for a long time, Does anyone know of a guide thats designed for the "learn by example" bunch?
---- Next question: Is a client (such as Project 16) required for MoparscapeV3.1? When I try to run Project 16 with Mopar I get an error about how the port Mopar needs is in use.
------- Next question: I tried to add in a few KBDs (king Black Dragon) into my server, I could only examine them and couldn't attack.. I don't understand why though..
------ Next question: I noticed that I can't do any trade skills, and can't even build a fire. When I click a NPC it just makes the Red X like it did something.. (but didn't) I have to trade to shop NPCs to get the shop window. Whats wrong?
------- Next Question: Does anyone know of a guide to manually adjust character appearance? I looked in the tuts. and couldn't find one.. Or maybe a script to allow character customization between male and female? ----------------
Are my monster, appearance, and craft problems solved from not using a client? What the hell does a client do?
I tried searches and other things on this forum before asking... So don't spam me about how I should look for myself. I would appreciate feedback and help, and I'll still be working on fixing my problems.
Thanks for your time and effort, beforehand. --Las

item.title: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server
item.dc:creator: @D27L7T D27L7T
item.description:
@D27L7T wrote:

Use WordPad. Save without formatting. Formatting is bold, italics, and underline. Java doesn’t need formatting.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server

item.title: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

try download Jcreator its an awsome program meant for java

you have to add alot of the stuff like cooking, fm, theiving ect…but alot of sources have some of those skills built in so i suggest download testscape or cheezscape update 80 look in the download section for those

Read full topic
item.source: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server

item.title: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server
item.dc:creator: @Laserous Laserous
item.description:
@Laserous wrote:

Thank you very much for the reply =), I’m reading it now and I’ll post my conclusions

Edit… wow Imma n00b from hell.
ok I see now, I can actually run a server without having Mopar up… SO now I just stick that code into Client.java… 1 second…

Edit#2
Omfg, Wordpad wants to save it in text-only and remove all formatting… which isn’t good because Java is a pain in the ass and needs all that (main reason I haven’t tried learning it thus far)
When I open it in notepad it automaticlly goes to wordpad (I hate wordpad) … If I save and compile will it screw it up?

Is there a freeware text-based program that I can use?

Edit#3
if(command.startsWith(“char”)) { is default on Project 16 Oo cool…
But… I want to be more than default… I wanna be able to understand what I’m seeing.
I again ask if anyone knows of a “Learn by example” tutorial for java.

Thank you very much for your help samuraiblood2! I’m one more tiny hampster-sized step from being a n00b at Java
^^

Edit#4
when I use the command that I implemented (if(command.startsWith(“char”)) I can’t use the accept button to finish the changes. It just does nothing… Project 16 says “Unhandled Packet”
Is there some way to finalize?

Stil can’t cook, haven’t tried anything else. When building a fire, after the logs are lit you can pick them up again.
I’m trying to make a private server because the real RS2 is easy for people to hack… thus they steal my crap. Is there a client that runs near how RS runs?

(I feel like I ask too much… sigh… so much to try to figure out…)

Read full topic
item.source: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server

item.title: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

well thats alot of good questions ok first a client is somthing you use to play on a server a source is somthing you use to make/run a server ill post a code for the character thing later and someone has just recently posted a [tut] that can help you get started let me find the url :p[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 01:22:04 AM[/size][hr]ok heres the url and heres the code url first http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28068.0.html

heres the code but read the tut url first

add this in client.java (says client and is in your source folder)

if(command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); apset = true; } save and compile if it doesnt work post your errors

Read full topic
item.source: I have a some important questions about java/Making your own server

item.description:
@Laserous wrote:

Ok, I tried to read the Java guide Miss. Silabsoft pointed out… but I can’t stand when people baby you into something. I know HTML and Javascript and have wanted to learn Java for a long time, Does anyone know of a guide thats designed for the “learn by example” bunch?

Next question:
Is a client (such as Project 16) required for MoparscapeV3.1? When I try to run Project 16 with Mopar I get an error about how the port Mopar needs is in use.

Next question: I tried to add in a few KBDs (king Black Dragon) into my server, I could only examine them and couldn’t attack… I don’t understand why though…

I noticed that I can’t do any trade skills, and can’t even build a fire. When I click a NPC it just makes the Red X like it did something… (but didn’t) I have to trade to shop NPCs to get the shop window. Whats wrong?

Does anyone know of a guide to manually adjust character appearance? I looked in the tuts. and couldn’t find one… Or maybe a script to allow character customization between male and female?

Are my monster, appearance, and craft problems solved from not using a client?
What the hell does a client do?

Thanks for your time and effort, beforehand.
